trans-unit.source: Provides a notification mechanism for a tracking service to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure about changes to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um mecanismo de notificação para um serviço de acompanhamento informar a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução sobre as alterações para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> para um determinado fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Tracking services manage the tracking profiles available to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Serviços de controle de gerenciar os perfis de rastreamento disponíveis para o infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A tracking service that implements IProfileNotification can provide notifications to the runtime tracking infrastructure when a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> either changes or is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de acompanhamento que implementa IProfileNotification pode fornecer notificações para a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução quando uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>para um determinado fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>altera ou não é mais válida.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure subscribes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> events and updates its cache when these events are raised.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução assina o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved>eventos e atualiza o cache quando esses eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: This decreases the number of requests for tracking profiles that the runtime tracking infrastructure makes to a tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Isso diminui o número de solicitações de perfis que faz com que a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução para um serviço de controle de controle.

trans-unit.source: Note: the runtime tracking infrastructure still uses the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A> methods of the tracking service, but it does not call them as frequently.
trans-unit.target: Observação: a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução ainda usa o sobrecarregado <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A>métodos do serviço de acompanhamento, mas não chamá-los como frequentemente.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a specific workflow Type is removed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> para um fluxo de trabalho específico tipo é removido.

trans-unit.source: A tracking service can raise the ProfileRemoved event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that new instances of the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> should not be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de controle pode gerar o evento ProfileRemoved para informar a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução que novas instâncias do fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>especificado em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs>não devem ser controladas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a specific workflow <xref:System.Type> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> para um fluxo de trabalho específico <xref:System.Type>é atualizada.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service can raise the ProfileUpdated event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> is available for the indicated workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de controle pode gerar o evento ProfileUpdated para informar a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução que um novo que <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>está disponível para o fluxo de trabalho indicado <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: The workflow <xref:System.Type> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> are passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>e que <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>são passadas em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Type>
